mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `member` SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), authLevel = #{authLevel}, loginID = #{loginID}, loginPW = #{loginPW}, `name` = #{name}, cellphoneNum = #{cellphoneNum}, email = #{email};
mapper.select: SELECT M.*, IFNULL(G.groupName,'전체') AS groupName FROM `member` AS M LEFT JOIN `group` AS G ON M.classId = G.id WHERE authLevel = #{authLevel}

WITH SP AS( SELECT S.*, P.cellphoneNum AS parentPhoneNum FROM `member` AS S LEFT JOIN `member` AS P ON S.id = P.babyId ) SELECT SP.*, IFNULL(G.groupName,'전체') AS groupName FROM SP LEFT JOIN `group` AS G ON SP.classId = G.id WHERE SP.classId = #{classId} AND SP.authLevel = 2
SELECT * FROM `member` WHERE authLevel = 2 AND `name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWord},'%')
